backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Rose Day features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of key frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining romantic-themed OKLCH color variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page metadata and loading fonts and the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the themed Rose Day page with hero, personalization, and interactive moments.
frontend/src/components/PersonalizationF: Form component allowing users to edit names and a message with a reset option.
frontend/src/components/RoseDayMoments.t: Component rendering clickable, accessible cards that reveal detailed romantic messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing login state and actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom rose-themed light/dark color palette, along with global typography and background settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state for a personalized Rose Day website, including features, requirements, and asset needs.
